name: Neo Edda
description:
In the early 13th century, the Aesir reach out to a desperate group of refugees a millennia after Ragnarok. Some are thankful for the divine intervention, but others wonder: what does this mean for them, and for the world? 

This is a demo for the in development game Neo Edda! It includes the prologue level and an endless survival arena mode. It's recommended to play the story mode first for the tutorials!

You can toggle fullscreen using Ctrl + F
